info.title: Navigate forwards to a button in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeButton
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the button
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the button
testPageDocument.querySelector('#beforelink').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Print Page' button
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Print Page' button
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
